item.title: Character Creation Guide
item.description: Character Creation Guide People like to make characters in very different ways. Some enjoy creating an elaborate backstory, and choose the class and race after, while others have a class in mind and make the afterward. However, you may do it, here is a list of things that are required for a completed character. Class Race Background Backstory Because of the interconnectedness between the classes, races, and world in this homebrew, I would recommend choosing a class first, followed by race, then background.

item.title: Introduction to DND Mechanics
item.description: Introductions to the Mechanics of DND Playing DND consists of 2 general gameplay modes, Adventuring and Combat. All sessions consist of one or more of these modes. In this section, I will try to summarize the two modes to hopefully give some clarity about what situations might arise in a typical session. After that, I will try to cover the dice and chance aspect of the game, along with an explanation of how your ability scores and skills come into play.

item.title: Welcome to my Homebrew!
item.description: Welcome to the wiki of my Homebrew! This homebrew introduces 8 classes, 4 races, a custom magic system, and a custom world named Eribar. Each of these Aspects can be found by navigating the tabs at the top.
